name: Pool Party (itch) (Numizmatic)
description:
Grab some phones or tablets and join the Pool Party! Social distancing in affect - you can stream the game through any app that lets you share your screen to play with your friends across the world. 

Sink all your balls and you win! It's that easy!

A game made by:
Chris Daviduik (Web App / Backend / Programming)
Brenden Cameron (Programming / Gameplay)
Hubert Bibrowski (Art / Programming)

To join a game go to http://numizmatic.com/poolparty
